4.name: Ultimate
4.description: Once your **POD:Shield** is filled, you can enable **Berserker Mode**. A2 takes **60%** Reduced Additional Damage, gains Increased Movement Speed, and gains **30%** Additional Damage Increase. During **Berserker Mode**, Normal Attack Rate is increased, consuming orbs will trigger an electric shock that deals an additional **150%** Physical Damage. A2 loses **4%** of her Maximum Health every second (If **POD: Shield** exists, it will be consumed first). **Berserker Mode** can be toggled manually, or will be automatically turned off when A2's Maximum Health reaches below **60%**. **Berserker Mode** cannot be re-enabled for **10** seconds after exiting. If A2 is switched during **Berserker Mode**, the **POD: Shield** will be consumed in the background until it depletes. Once the **POD: Shield** is depleted in the background, A2 will exit **Berserker Mode**.

1.name: Core
1.description: 3 orb combos grants A2 with **POD: Shield** based off **5%** of her Maximum Health (stacks up to **30%** of her Maximum Health) and summons an auxiliary machine that will fire **6** homing missiles to random targets in front of her, dealing a total of **140%** Physical Damage and each successful missile strike on the enemy will grant A2 **POD: Shield** equivalent to 3% of her Maximum Health. The missiles will inflict a **5** second **Taunt** (**20%** Defense Reduction, the effect is doubled when 9S and 2B is present in the team). Holding your dodge button while moving will give A2 a Dash Boost for up to 2 seconds. The first second of Dash Boost will grant A2 **POD: Shield** up to **10%** of her Maximum Health. A2's dodge meter does not recover while dashing, but the constant electric stream around her body will **constantly attract nearby enemies** {does not deal damage}.

3.description: A2 gains **50% POD: Shield** meter whenever she enters the field. During **Berserker Mode**, your auxiliary machine will automatically release a bombardment of homing missiles every 4 seconds. If A2 leaves the stage while in **Berserker Mode**, and if 2B and 9s are present in the team, the next character on stage will have **10%** Physical Damage Increase until A2 exits **Berserker Mode**.

4.name: SSS Passive

Homing missiles launched by the auxillary machine deals **100%** more damage and has a **40%** effectiveness increase to **Taunt** {Tracking Missiles now do 240%, 40% Taunt Defense Reduction added to Base Value}.

5.name: SSS+ Passive

When **POD: Shield** is present while A2 is in **Berserker Mode**, her Ultimate cost is reduced by **2.5%** of her Maximum Health every second {4% >1.5%, does apply for off-field shield consumption), as-well-as gain a **10%** Additional Damage Increase}.

1.name: Core
1.description: Gain 100 **Overload Energy** at the start of the stage. Whenever you do a 3 orb combo, if your **Overload Energy** is greater than 50, you will consume 50 **Overload Energy** and gain a respective colored **Overload Indicator** at the far right of your orb panel (only 1 can exist at any given time). You can recover 20 **Overload Energy** every second (up to 100.) Tapping on the **Overload Indicator** will clear out all the orbs that have the same color and summon a POD Auxiliary Machine to release multiple bullets, dealing **100%**/**200%**/**300%** Physical Damage (orbs cleared by *Overload Indicator** does not count as a normal orb consume). If the orbs cleared by **Overload Indicator** is greater than 3, you will gain back the excess orbs, orbs gained are random. When 9S is switched, the cooldown of switching back to him is decreased based on how many times an **Overload Indicator** is activated (each release decreases 1 second, up to 4 seconds).

QTE and Blue Orbs add **Electron Medicine** to 2B and A2. **Electron Medicine**: **10%** Physical Damage Increase, lasts for **8** seconds.

4.name: SSS Passive
4.description: Recovery time for orbs is reduced to **2** seconds, 9S can recover orbs in the background {9S random orb gain 3 > 2 seconds, the background gain is separate of the SSS orb gain}. **50%** Damage Increase on **Overload Indicator** {Ultimate}, effectiveness on **Electron Medicine** changes to **20%** and it lasts 12 seconds now {from 8 seconds}.

1.name: Core
1.description: After a 3 Yellow Orb combo, any 3 orb combo following it will gain you **160 Stance Stability** points. **20** points are deducted every second, triggering it again will not refresh its duration. When **Stance Stability** points are present, enter **Battle Stance**. Within this mode, your Normal Attacks, Red Orbs, and Yellow Orbs will all have an additional **Sword Wave**, each **Sword Wave** deals **70%** Physical Damage, Blue orbs will be able to cancel out your current attack stagger. Any **2**/**3** Red Orb combo within **Battle Stance** will add **1**/**2** stacks of **Data Repair**, lasting **8** seconds, **3** stacks at max. Each stack grants a **2%** Physical Damage increase (if 9S or A2 is present within the team, **4%** increase). All **Data Repair** stacks will be removed after exiting **Battle Stance**. Ultimate and triggering **Data Repair** again will refresh **Data Repair's** stack duration. **Stance Stability** isn't consumed during Ultimate.

Data Repair stacks Increase Physical Damage by **4%** per stack (if 9S and A2 are present in the team, 8% increase).
